subject: Golf
United States Women's Open (Golf)
Women's British Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: The goal of bringing the best women golfers to an Alp-laced slice of paradise in France for a top global competition has become reality as The Evian Championship is now the game's fifth major.
